title: rum19980
author: rum19980
content: Hi guys do you think FLOKI good to invest at current price ? do you thinkit can increase with X10 or more ? and is it possible to get listed in Binance ?I t seem that this is a famous project and have big community but the price looks very lowhttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/floki-inu/https://twitter.com/RealFlokiInu

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: The hype of meme tokens is gone, there is no hope of investing in meme tokens anymore. We can see the real evidence from Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB). If the question is "is investing in Floki Inu a good investment?" the answer is NO. It's better to look for potential tokens or coins that are currently in the hype, for example Move-to-Earn (M2E) tokens.Next "Can Floki Inu be listed on Binance?", again the answer is NO. Don't ask again why, you can see my first statement.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on June 17, 2022, 05:19:23 PMHi guys do you think FLOKI good to invest at current price ? do you thinkit can increase with X10 or more ? and is it possible to get listed in Binance ?https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/floki-inu/I personally would not invest into that project and there are several reasons for that. The first and also most important reason why i would never put money into Floki Inu is that it is just another meme-coin that has no real use case and is also providing no utility to it's users. It is just a sh*it-coin that was created once it become public that Elon Musks new dog is named Floki, that is literally all what that token is about and that is just not enough to survive in the crypto world in the longterm.The second reason is, that i generally think that the time of meme-coins is over. During the peak of the meme-coin hype a few months ago there were literally hundreds created each and every day and 99% of them were already dead again in a few days. Floki Inu was one of the most successful ones but nevertheless i think the long term direction of it's price is still downwards.

comments.author: Mosharafhh
comments.body: I think its also a project of no usecases also you can call it a meme coin like shiba. I dont think its a smart choice of invest on this types of project. Choose any valuable project for invest if you hold your investment long time otherwise invest if you short trade!

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Investing in altcoins is bad in times of economic crisis, so what about a global recession that everyone expects to happen?When I talk about altcoins, I mean those real currencies that have a future and are less than 20 currencies and not an unknown currency, so it will not be a good investment.And finally, I think this scam crypto trying to draw Floki's character[1] in Vikings, which is an extra negative sign.[1] https://vikings.fandom.com/wiki/Floki

comments.author: mdgabrielzim
comments.body: I thought the hype about dog coins was over, but apparently a lot of people still think they can gain something from them. My friend, run away from these dead-end coins and start studying serious projects or you will lose your hard-earned money.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: No, no, and no.If the market is still dumping, automatically if you invest in shitcoin now it will only be worth a big 0. Unless you are very prepared to risk your 0 wallet balance being exposed very clearly, even in a fairly long time, or will not come back again. It's up to you, please choose. But if you have other options, you should at least stay away from shitcoin.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Investing in altcoin right now is quite risky. And meme coin is at more risk. You would lose your total portfolio. Bitcoin movement is unpredictable right now, so at any time market would collapse more. Altcoins are dumped because of Bitcoin, it's not new, you may select Bitcoin or some other potential and solid altcoin for investment. I won't invest in a meme coin which hasn't been listed in Binance.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Why are you interested in the project you mentioned (I won’t be mentioning the name of the project) you brought it up as a topic you ought to affix to it why you think it’s an option for you, then people can know how to direct you, the crypto-currency market world is very large with several coins in it, you need to first find what is what researching about a coin before progressing, well although I don’t believe in hype, but it’s could be one of the factors that can make you to research about any coin.

comments.author: EmmaGod
comments.body: I personally won't invest in any meme coin, I'll rather stick to USDT or btc to hold for this period as the market is bearish. Meme coin has had a good run and several persons cashed out from the hype. But the hype is no more as the industry has moved past this stage.

comments.author: tomahawk9
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on June 17, 2022, 05:19:23 PMit can increase with X10 or more ? and is it possible to get listed in Binance ?I t seem that this is a famous project and have big community but the price looks very lowvaporware dead coin. I'm sure you'll find more promising shitcoins between the top 200-400 cryptosQuote from: hugeblack on June 17, 2022, 06:42:18 PMAnd finally, I think this scam crypto trying to draw Floki's character[1] in Vikings, which is an extra negative sign.[1] https://vikings.fandom.com/wiki/Flokithis crypto is a shitcoin but, how is the name a negative sign? as long as the name isn't trademarked, they're free to use it. I mean, Shiba Inu (SHIB)'s name comes from the name of a japanese hunting dog. Tron (TRX) uses the name of an american movie from the 80's. Polygon (MATIC) uses the same name of a entertainment website created almost a decade ago.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: This is just another shitcoin so I wouldn't invest in it. You can make some profit out of it on the short term but long term, it is almost a guarantee that you will loose your money out of it. I get that it is appealing for a lot of people to invest in coins as this, but there is no such thing as easy money.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: This is another meme coin that's made after they've seen the hype of Dogecoin. Do you think that it's still worth your money to invest in this coin?If you think that this is still going to be the same hype as the Dogecoin before? If you think so, you buy at your own risk knowing that detail. But if you want to save your money look for something else to invest with like bitcoin and that's going to give you a better decision and idea on what you must buy at this bear.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on June 17, 2022, 05:19:23 PMHi guys do you think FLOKI good to invest at current price ? do you thinkit can increase with X10 or more ? and is it possible to get listed in Binance ?I t seem that this is a famous project and have big community but the price looks very lowWe have been having a very difficult week with all the market crashing at the same time and you are looking to invest in a meme coin which is even outside of the top 1000?You need to learn to read the markets, right now people are avoiding taking risks as much as possible, which is why even bitcoin has been having problems maintaining its price, as it is too risky for some people, and you want to invest in some of the most risky assets that you can buy in this market? This is simply the wrong strategy at the worst possible time and I do not recommend you invest in that coin.

comments.author: Jaered
comments.body: Right now, meme coins are living in past glory. Unless they pull up some interesting utility like Saitama Inu and Shiba Inu are doing, and even Dogecoin. We have to wait and see if newer ones would pop up and keep up the hype, but I doubt so

comments.author: bhooscream
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on June 17, 2022, 05:19:23 PMHi guys do you think FLOKI good to invest at current price ? do you thinkWhat's about your own analysis? have you analyzed the projects and how its developing so far?Well, I see that this is FLOKI Inu, seems like Shiba Inu? another meme coin? Shit coin exactly. With the rank that is still over 2k, low market cap and trading volume, not really clear enough profit development and utility. Absolutely I personally will not choose this coin for investment. Quote from: rum19980 on June 17, 2022, 05:19:23 PMit can increase with X10 or more ? and is it possible to get listed in Binance ?No one knows even the developer itself, moreover, this is likely shit coin and we don't know if this will survive or not in the current bearish market. Actually, this coin has been listed in several top exchanges, but it doesn't mean to guarantee the value.

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: Memecoins are really bad investment, they are highly volatile and also most of them time just gonna causes lose. I wonder why so many people keep on investing in this meme coin although frequently it just results in loss at the end of the day.you better off investing in something like avalanche and matic because they have real underlying innovation instead of just random memecoins like floki that you mentioned.So basically avoid memecoins investment at all costs, they will just results in investment loss.

comments.author: adzino
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on June 17, 2022, 05:19:23 PMHi guys do you think FLOKI good to invest at current price ? do you thinkit can increase with X10 or more ? and is it possible to get listed in Binance ?I t seem that this is a famous project and have big community but the price looks very lowhttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/floki-inu/https://twitter.com/RealFlokiInuAnother meme coin with no use case. Sure, if you want to try your luck hoping that binance will list them one day and the price will skyrocket, then yeah, go ahead and invest some of your money which you can afford to lose in floki inu. But don't go all in, or you will end up regretting. And once the price go up, the best thing to do is pocket the profit and leave.Why invest in meme and shitcoins when you have bitcoin and other well known altcoins?

comments.author: smartaction
comments.body: In this bad conditions of crypto market it is not good secession to invest on any untop altcoins even any meme coins. I will not say that Floki Inu is not a good token. But I mean it is better, not to invest in it right now. I only expressed my opinion.  Do your own research and analysis before investing in a cryptocurrency coins
